segments.text: Excuse me ? Do you have anything for a carsickness ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it's for my brother . The little boy over there . He is getting a carsickness .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Poor boy ! But don't worry . Here are two pills made in Germany . It's really effective . He will be just fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take some with you next time , just in case .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry to interrupt , but my brother is still sleeping .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean the boy who felt carsick just now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It's so strange that he slept all the time after taking the pills .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , sorry , maybe I gave you the wrong medicine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's just sleeping pills made in America which is also very good . But don't worry . It has no undesirable side-effects .
segments.speaker: S2
